text:
Mike Fitzpatrick Wounded in Vietnam Action 
Mr. and Mrs. Neil Fitzpatrick were notified yesterday that their son, L/Cpl. Michael N. Fitzpatrick, had been wounded in action, Wednesday, Oct. 11. Cpl Fitzpatrick was wounded by rifle fire in both legs while fighting with the 3rd Marine Division in the vicinity of Quang Tri, Vietnam. He is based on the carrier Okinawa and has been returned to carrier for treatment. He had been in Vietnam just over a month 
The Fitzpatricks were notified, but by a personal visit from a Marine sergeant, and a telegram they received last night Mike's condition is reported to be good. His address is L/Cpl. Michael Fitzpatrick 2277547 
Charlie Co. 3rd Plt. 1st Bn., 3rd Marine Div. FPO, San Francisco, Cal. 96602
